sod.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a very offensive word for someone, especially a man, who you think is stupid or annoying
sod.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used to refer to a person
sod.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: The poor sod's wife left him.
sod.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a piece of earth or the layer of earth with grass and roots growing in it
sod.translation[1].definitions[0].type: transitive only in imperative or infinitive
sod.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: used to say rudely that something is not important
